name: Highpriest to the Light TLD
characterLoreTooltips: Only a select few Disciple Priests have ever been admitted into Seraph's retinue. Ever eager to be the only one with Seraph's ear, the Highpriest discredited the others through well-placed lies or, in some cases, untimely deaths.
pactCrystalsVariantData: Highpriest to the Light TLD Shard
